How to Install hledger-ui on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • hledger-ui

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install hledger-ui on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing hledger-ui on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall hledger-ui in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install hledger-ui, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install hledger-ui Using apt

To install hledger-ui in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install hledger-ui using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install hledger-ui

The installation of hledger-ui might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install hledger-ui Using apt-get

To install hledger-ui using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install hledger-ui.

sudo apt-get -y install hledger-ui

Install hledger-ui Using Synaptic

To install hledger-ui using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install hledger-ui on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for hledger-ui. This will display the hledger-ui package in the package window, now to install hledger-ui, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the hledger-ui package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of hledger-ui.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install hledger-ui Using aptitude

To install hledger-ui on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of hledger-ui.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install hledger-ui using the command aptitude install hledger-ui.

sudo aptitude -y install hledger-ui

How to Upgrade hledger-ui on debian

If you want to upgrade the hledger-ui package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade hledger-ui using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade hledger-ui to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade hledger-ui.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade hledger-ui sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade hledger-ui

Upgrade hledger-ui using Aptitude

To upgrade hledger-ui using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade hledger-ui.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade hledger-ui

Upgrade hledger-ui using Synaptic

To upgrade hledger-ui using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for hledger-ui, now right-click hledger-ui, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade hledger-ui just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall hledger-ui on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall hledger-ui from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just hledger-ui, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove hledger-ui

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of hledger-ui

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of hledger-ui you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge hledger-ui

Remove hledger-ui using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall hledger-ui using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for hledger-ui, right-click the hledger-ui package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall hledger-ui click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install hledger-ui on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade hledger-ui using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of hledger-ui then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
